title: Individual house of size upto 150 sq
clause_text: Individual house of size upto 150 sq.m. for entire holding mentioned in the single 7/12 extract, as on date of coming in to force of these regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
